trans-unit.source: Specifies the values that resolve a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> using the PNRP Namespace Provider API protocol.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值會使用 PNRP 命名空間提供者 API 通訊協定將 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 解析成 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> which contains all the information for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> that was published in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> or cloud(s) that were queried during the resolve process.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>其中包含的所有資訊<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>中已發佈<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>或已在解析程序期間查詢的 cloud。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver" /> 類別預設的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: After successfully resolving a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> contains all the information for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> that was published in the cloud(s) that were queried during the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 已成功解決之後<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>、<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>包含所指定的所有資訊<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A>cloud 查詢期間中已發佈<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs" /> object that contains the data returned by the <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted" /> 事件所傳回之資料的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns peer resolution data after the <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted" /> 事件之後，傳回對等解析資料。

trans-unit.source: This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer name resolution data after peer resolution has completed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是用來處理對等名稱解析資料之後對等解析已完成的非同步回撥。

trans-unit.source: Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event is raised by the peer resolver object.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的類型可以覆寫此方法，以執行其他工作時<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>對等解析程式物件所引發事件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs" /> object that contains peer name resolution progress information returned by the <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs" /> 物件，其中包含 <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged" /> 事件傳回的對等名稱解析進度資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns peer resolution progress data when the <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged" /> 事件引發時傳回對等解析進度資料。

trans-unit.source: This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer resolution data after peer resolution progress has been requested.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是用來處理對等解析資料之後已要求對等解析進度的非同步回撥。

trans-unit.source: Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的類型可以覆寫此方法，以執行其他工作時<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived type, be sure to call the base type's <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged(System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定呼叫基底型別時覆寫這個方法在衍生的型別，<see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged(System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Resolves a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> object to a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> using the PNRP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PNRP 通訊協定，將 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 物件解析成 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" />。

trans-unit.source: This method associates peer names to clouds.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將對等名稱至雲端產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method for each peer name record in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>方法是類似於呼叫<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法中的每個對等名稱記錄<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，使用個別的對等名稱記錄 Resolve 方法不會使解析多個對等名稱。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: They are identical in the parameters they are passed, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token in its parameter list for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: 它們完全相同的參數傳遞，除了 ResolveAsync 方法在非同步事件處理其參數清單中包括系統語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is not supplied, the method uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in cloud parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>沒有提供參數，此方法會使用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>捷徑，以填入雲端參數。

trans-unit.source: If the `maxRecords` parameter is missing, the default value of zero causes an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`maxRecords`參數遺漏，預設值為零的原因<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This event will also be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 解析作業中錯誤完成或取消時，也會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />。

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> in all clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 解析呼叫端對等電腦已知的所有 Cloud 中的特定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection" /> that contains all peer name records (represented as <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> objects) associated with the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection" />，內含與指定的對等名稱相關聯的所有對等名稱記錄 (表示為 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> 物件)。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> can be registered by different users in the same <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 對於不安全的對等個體名稱，相同的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 可由不同的使用者在相同的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 中登錄，並與不同的端點產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This method associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將對等名稱至雲端關聯。

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: 會查詢所有雲端<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>。

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果對等名稱無法解析或`null`、<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以註冊 （及不同的端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內不同的對等。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method for each peer name record in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>方法是類似於呼叫<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法中的每個對等名稱記錄<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，使用個別的對等名稱記錄 Resolve 方法不會使解析多個對等名稱。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: 其參數清單完全相同，除了 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is not supplied, the method uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in cloud parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>沒有提供參數，此方法會使用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>捷徑，以填入雲端參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>解析作業中錯誤完成或取消時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to resolve a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> published in any <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將說明如何解決<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>發行任何<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="peerName" /> parameter is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> 參數設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The peer name specified cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 無法解析指定的對等名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> objects to obtain from all <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> objects for the supplied <c>peerName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 針對提供的 <c>peerName</c>，要從所有 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 物件中取得的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> 物件數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified peer name in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than the specified number of <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 解析呼叫端對等電腦已知的所有 Cloud 中的特定對等名稱，並傳回指定數目範圍內的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection" /> whose size is less than or equal to <paramref name="maxRecords" /> entries.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection" />，其大小小於或等於 <paramref name="maxRecords" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: This collection contains peer name records associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> that was resolved.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合會包含與解析之 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 相關聯的對等名稱記錄。

trans-unit.source: This method associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將對等名稱至雲端關聯。

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the peer name.
trans-unit.target: 對等名稱查詢的所有雲端。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same peer name can be registered by different users in the same <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 不安全的對等名稱，相同的對等名稱可由不同的使用者在同一個註冊<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>，以及與不同的端點相關聯。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> cannot be resolved (for example, the peer name is not published) an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>無法解析 （例如，尚未發行對等名稱）<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: 其參數清單完全相同，除了 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>解析作業中錯誤完成或取消時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="peerName" /> parameter is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> 參數設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="maxRecords" /> parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maxRecords" /> 參數小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 提供的對等名稱無法解析。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> in which to resolve the peer name.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解析對等名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />。

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName" /> in the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 解析指定的 <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName" /> 中指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection" /> that contains all peer name records (represented as <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> objects) associated with the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection" />，內含與指定的對等名稱相關聯的所有對等名稱記錄 (表示為 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> 物件)。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> can be registered by different users in the same <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 對於不安全的對等個體名稱，相同的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 可由不同的使用者在相同的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 中登錄，並與不同的端點產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> cannot be resolved (i.e., the peer name is not published) an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>無法解析 （亦即，尚未發行對等名稱）<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以註冊 （及不同的端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內不同的對等。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: 其參數清單完全相同，除了 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>參數是`null`、<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>使用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>捷徑以填滿<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>解析作業中錯誤完成或取消時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="peerName" /> parameter is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> 參數設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 提供的對等名稱無法解析。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> in which to resolve the <c>peerName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解析 <c>peerName</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of peer name record objects to obtain from the specified cloud for the specified <c>peerName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要從指定雲端中取得的指定 <c>peerName</c> 對等名稱記錄物件數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName" /> in the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />, returning no more than the specified number of <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 解析指定的 <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName" /> 中指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />，並傳回指定數目範圍內的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection" /> whose size is less than or equal to <paramref name="maxRecords" /> entries.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection" />，其大小小於或等於 <paramref name="maxRecords" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: This collection contains peer name records associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> that was resolved.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合會包含與解析之 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 相關聯的對等名稱記錄。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以註冊 （及不同的端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內不同的對等。

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果對等名稱不能解析，<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: 其參數清單完全相同，除了 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>參數是`null`、<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>使用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>捷徑以填滿<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>解析作業中錯誤完成或取消時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="peerName" /> parameter is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> 參數設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="maxRecords" /> parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maxRecords" /> 參數小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 提供的對等名稱無法解析。

trans-unit.source: These methods begin an asynchronous resolution operation for the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> in all clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會在呼叫端對等電腦已知的所有 Cloud 中，針對指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 開始進行非同步解析作業。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, which is used when asynchronous processing is required.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>時需要非同步處理所使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: They are identical in the parameters they are passed, except that ResolveAsync includes a system token in its parameter list for event handling.
trans-unit.target: 不同之處在於 ResolveAsync 包含系統語彙基元，為事件處理其參數清單中，它們具有在傳遞的參數完全相同。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter mismatch occurs between the Resolve method and the ResolveAsync method, and the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is not supplied, the method uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in cloud parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數不相符，就會發生 Resolve 方法和 ResolveAsync 方法之間，而<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>沒有提供參數，此方法會使用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>捷徑，以填入雲端參數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains state information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關對等名稱解析作業狀態資訊的使用者定義物件。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName" /> in all clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 在所有雲端中針對呼叫對等已知的指定 <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName" /> 開始非同步對等名稱解析作業。

trans-unit.source: This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法以非同步方式將對等名稱至雲端產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: 會查詢所有雲端<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>。

trans-unit.source: It raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它會引發<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>事件，回撥<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，便會產生<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>事件，回撥<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果對等名稱不能解析，<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以註冊 （及不同的端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內不同的對等。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method for each peer name record in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>方法是類似於呼叫<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法中的每個對等名稱記錄<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，使用個別的對等名稱記錄 Resolve 方法不會使解析多個對等名稱。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: 其參數清單完全相同，除了 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元和解決方法適用於同步處理。

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token.
trans-unit.target: 解析程式物件的所有非同步參考會協調以唯一識別項語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 這`userState`語彙基元或訊息的識別項可讓作業系統，來將訊息放在訊息佇列之後，傳遞訊息至單一的接收處理序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>解析作業中錯誤完成或取消時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the <paramref name="peerName" /> and <paramref name="userState" /> parameters are set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> 和 <paramref name="userState" /> 參數之一或二者設為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to obtain for the Peer Name.
trans-unit.target: 對等名稱可取得的記錄數目上限。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the resolve operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義物件，包含解析作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than <paramref name="maxRecords" /> entries for the peer name.
trans-unit.target: 在所有雲端中針對呼叫對等已知的指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 開始非同步對等名稱解析作業，只會傳回對等名稱的 <paramref name="maxRecords" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法以非同步方式將對等名稱至雲端產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: 會查詢所有雲端<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以註冊 （及不同的端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內不同的對等。

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果對等名稱無法解析或`null`、<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>事件，回撥<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，便會產生<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>事件，回撥<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: 其參數清單完全相同，除了 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元和解決方法適用於同步處理。

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 解析程式物件的所有非同步參考會經過協調以唯一識別項語彙基元<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 這`userState`語彙基元或訊息的識別項可讓作業系統，來將訊息放在訊息佇列之後，傳遞訊息至單一的接收處理序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>解析作業中錯誤完成或取消時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the <paramref name="peerName" /> and <paramref name="userState" /> parameters are set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> 和 <paramref name="userState" /> 參數之一或二者設為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="maxRecords" /> parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maxRecords" /> 參數小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> in which to resolve the <c>peerName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解析 <c>peerName</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含對等名稱解析作業資訊的使用者定義 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> in the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 中針對指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />，開始非同步對等名稱解析作業。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>事件，回撥<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，便會產生<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>事件，回撥<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以註冊 （及不同的端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內不同的對等。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>參數是`null`，名稱會解析使用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>捷徑，初始化為預設值<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: 其參數清單完全相同，除了 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元和解決方法適用於同步處理。

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token.
trans-unit.target: 解析程式物件的所有非同步參考會協調以唯一識別項語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 這`userState`語彙基元或訊息的識別項可讓作業系統，來將訊息放在訊息佇列之後，傳遞訊息至單一的接收處理序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>解析作業中錯誤完成或取消時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the <paramref name="peerName" /> and <paramref name="userState" /> parameters are set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> 和 <paramref name="userState" /> 參數之一或二者設為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <c>peerName</c> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的 <c>peerName</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <c>cloud</c> in which to resolve <c>peerName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解析 <c>peerName</c> 的 <c>cloud</c>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to obtain from <c>cloud</c> for <c>peerName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <c>cloud</c> 取得的 <c>peerName</c> 記錄數目上限。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含對等名稱解析作業資訊的使用者定義物件。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> in the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" />.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud" /> 中針對指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />，開始非同步對等名稱解析作業。

trans-unit.source: The resolution operation will resolve no more than <paramref name="maxRecords" /> entries for the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: 解析作業針對指定的對等名稱將不會解析超過 <paramref name="maxRecords" /> 個項目。

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以註冊 （及不同的端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內不同的對等。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>事件，回撥<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，便會產生<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>事件，回撥<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>參數是`null`，名稱會解析使用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>捷徑，初始化為預設值<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>方法，沒有對等項目<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: 其參數清單完全相同，除了 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元和解決方法適用於同步處理。

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the peer resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 對等解析程式物件的所有非同步參考會經過協調以唯一識別項語彙基元<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 這`userState`語彙基元或訊息的識別項可讓作業系統，來將訊息放在訊息佇列之後，傳遞訊息至單一的接收處理序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>解析作業中錯誤完成或取消時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the <paramref name="peerName" /> and <paramref name="userState" /> parameters are set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> 和 <paramref name="userState" /> 參數之一或二者設為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: One or more supplied parameters are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個提供的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: Successful completion of this operation requires at least one event handler.
trans-unit.target: 至少需要一個事件處理常式才能成功完成此作業。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="maxRecords" /> parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maxRecords" /> 參數小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: The object provided to the <see cref="Overload:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync" /> method instance which started the resolve operation.
trans-unit.target: 提供給啟動解析作業的 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync" /> 方法執行個體的物件。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the specified asynchronous peer name resolution request.
trans-unit.target: 取消指定的非同步對等名稱解析要求。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method guarantees the system will not attempt to obtain additional records for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法可確保系統不會嘗試取得指定的其他記錄<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called when an asynchronous peer name resolution operation is not outstanding, it acts as a "no operation" (NO OP).
trans-unit.target: 如果無法未處理的非同步對等名稱解析作業時，會呼叫這個方法，它會充當 「 沒有作業 」 (NO OP)。

trans-unit.source: The `userState` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call when multiple calls are in progress.
trans-unit.target: `userState`必須提供物件，因為它用來追蹤特定的非同步呼叫時多次呼叫正在進行中。

trans-unit.source: This caller-supplied object is unique for each peer name resolution request.
trans-unit.target: 此呼叫端提供的物件是唯一的每個對等名稱解析要求。

trans-unit.source: This method will return immediately, but the operation may or may not immediately cancel.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會立即傳回，但作業可能會或可能無法立即取消。

trans-unit.source: The event arguments returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event contains a field which can be polled by clients to determine whether cancellation occurred.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的事件引數<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>事件中包含的欄位，可輪詢來判斷是否發生取消的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method ensures the ResolveCompleted event will be signaled as soon as possible with the event argument <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法可確保將儘速信號 ResolveCompleted 事件，事件引數與<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="userState" /> parameters cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="userState" /> 參數不可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted" /> event is signaled when a peer name resolution request for a specific <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName" /> has completed.
trans-unit.target: 當特定 <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName" /> 的對等名稱解析要求完成時，<see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted" /> 事件會發出信號。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event will be raised once for each endpoint found, and this event will be raised only once when all endpoints have been found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>會一次引發事件，找不到，每個端點，只有當已找到所有端點後，才會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This event will also be raised if the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果也會引發這個事件<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>作業錯誤完成或取消。

trans-unit.source: This event is signaled whenever a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> object is found in response to a <see cref="Overload:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync" /> operation for a specific <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" />.
trans-unit.target: 每當針對特定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName" /> 的 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync" /> 作業回應中找到 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord" /> 物件時，會發出此事件。

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> objects exist in the cloud(s) being queried, this event is signaled once for each <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> found.
trans-unit.target: 若為多個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>物件存在於 cloud 正在查詢中，通知此事件一次針對每個<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>找到。
